books.name: UX for Beginners
books.author: Joel Marsh
books.openion: Apps! Websites! Rubber Ducks! Naked Ninjas! This book has everything.

books.name: Don't Make Me Think
books.author: Steve Krug
books.openion: I thought usability was the enemy of design until I read the first edition of this book

books.name: Learning Web Design
books.author: Jennifer Robbins
books.openion: I wanted a primer on the field of web design to adapt to a new role in my job. This book was suited to the task well.
